details.description: LitShelf is a MERN stack reading tracker and virtual bookshelf. Users can log reading progress, add reviews, organize books, and visualize reading stats.
challenges: Building a responsive bookshelf interface with categories
Securing user data and Firebase JWT validation
Designing insightful reading analytics with charts
futurePlans: Social features â€“ follow friends and see their shelves
Integrate book APIs like Google Books for live search

details.description: PlantPal is a plant care tracker app allowing users to log, monitor, and schedule care tasks. Built for plant lovers to manage their green companions.
challenges: Securing private plant data for users
Creating dynamic and themed UI for plant types
futurePlans: Add image uploads for plant profiles
Introduce AI health diagnosis for plants

details.description: JOB S Y is a job platform that connects global job seekers with top employers. It features secure login, curated job listings, user profiles, blogs, and more.
challenges: Creating user role-based access for job applications
Handling protected routes for unauthenticated users
Building responsive layouts across screen sizes
futurePlans: Employer dashboard with posting and analytics
In-app messaging between companies and applicants
